TopicTitle: The Jedi Master, No Longer On Hiatus!

Articles.Content:
Hey, Jedi here. I'm going to be gone for about four days, starting at 9:00 PM EST. Might be five, but assuming no freak accidents, it probably won't be any longer than that. Just wanted to let everyone know. I'll be here for a few hours longer, so feel free to respond.

Don't burn the place down while I'm gone, all right? Sometimes it feels like I can't leave you alone for five minutes. And whatever you do, don't release an update of any sort while I'm gone.

Edited May 6, 2014 by The Jedi Master

Don't worry, it's may, not april, so we won;t have that.... horrible experience again...

...probably
I lost my lighter last week, so don't worry about any burning until i find it again...
I'll be handing the computer over to my brother now, and my hiatus will begin. Don't have any wild parties while I'm gone, all right?
Quick! Party in Jedi's thread while he's away!

I'm back! At least you cleaned up after that party...

(sees that we switched to curse)

You burned the place down, didn't you?
